courses.title: Eternal Sunrise
courses.description: A soothing melody that captures the beauty of morning light.Perfect for relaxing and starting your day with peace.

courses.title: City Lights
courses.description: A chill electronic track inspired by urban nightlife.Great background music for late-night drives.

courses.title: Rainy Day Jazz
courses.description: Smooth jazz tones that match a rainy afternoon.Creates a cozy and mellow atmosphere indoors.

courses.title: Night Drive
courses.description: An ambient synthwave track for cruising through the night.Filled with nostalgic 80s vibes and retro energy.
courses.instruction: Listen with car stereo or headphones.

courses.title: Mountain Echo
courses.description: A cinematic instrumental inspired by vast landscapes.Powerful and emotional with orchestral elements.
courses.instruction: Play in quiet surroundings for full effect.

courses.title: Ocean Breeze
courses.description: Relaxing tropical sounds with soft guitar strums.Perfect for meditation or beach-themed moments.

courses.title: Fire in the Sky
courses.description: A dramatic rock anthem with explosive guitar solos.Great for motivation and adrenaline boosts.

courses.title: Starlight Waltz
courses.description: A delicate piano waltz under a starry sky.Romantic, slow-paced, and full of emotion.
courses.instruction: Best with candlelight or night setting.

courses.title: Digital Dreams
courses.description: Futuristic beats mixed with glitchy textures.Perfect for tech content, gaming, or sci-fi themes.

courses.title: Whispers of Wind
courses.description: Nature-inspired acoustic piece with wind chimes.Ideal for yoga, relaxation, or focus sessions.
